What's new: Figma integration! Log in with your Figma account and use Figma assets in your Haiku projects
Haiku Community! Publish components to https://share.haiku.ai, give kudos, and fork projects
Launched a knowledge base at https://help.haiku.ai
Fixes: Fixed a bug that could cause elements with filter gradients to render incorrectly
Publish UI install instructions now always display project names and usernames in lowercase
